page.title: 05Family and House
page.content: Family and House In my family I have no brothers or sisters. I don't have a pet either.My hobby is gardening and I have a patch of earth which has a lot of flowers in it which i planted.My daddy likes steam trains and he has lots of books about them.My mummy likes weaving best of all and she has got a loom.My room is painted different shades of yellow which makes it bright.I have lots of books and toys and I have a bunk bed.My room is big and I like it. Typical Day My typical day is Monday because after school we do athletics on the field.It is from 3.15 to 4.00.We get changed at 3.15 and we wear shorts tee-shirts and trainers.Then we go to the field.We stand in a line.Then we do athletics.We do running races,throwing and distances.Then at 4.00 we go back
